Sherum-Ishtar

Sherum-Ishtar was the founder and first emporer of the Arthalean Empire, born around 1,314 BC in DÃ¶werslot, and passing around 1,248 BC with the Arthalean conquest ongoing. At his passing, his remains were entombed in a mausoleum overlooking Komholt from the outcropping of the Hellighil, accross the River Aflys.
